card.title:
Handling
classic exceptions VS. class-based exceptions?
(Code-Beispiel, Syntax)

card.content:
Fehler innerhalb Try-Catch-Block:
- processing is terminated
- system branches directly to relevant CATCH-Block.


class-based-exceptions ermÃ¶glichen viel - in diesem Kurs: Minimalbehandlung.

card.content:
Instanzen werden in Variablen gespeichert (Pointer)

Definition:
DATA gr_ref_name**TYPE REF TO** class_name.

Instantiierung:
**CRATE OBJECT** gr_ref_name.

//evtl: method CONSTRUCTOR supply with data//

Ansprache:
**CALL METHOD** gr_ref_name->method_name
